question: We need you to help us learn about better treatment options for heart attack patients. Please take this two minute survey.I've had a heart attack and I'm not taking statins:http://www.medhelp.org/heart-disease/pages/Survey-2-Heart-Attack-with-no-Statins/1154Your anonymous answers will help us better understand this condition and help others.Thanks for your participation.MedHelp
title: Please take this survey
